T4ReferencePath.description: Additional folders to search for T4 references

T4ParameterValues.description: T4 key-value property to pass to T4 templates

T4Transform.description: Files to be transformed using the T4 engine

T4Preprocess.description: Files to be preprocessed using the T4 engine

metadata.Class: Fully qualified name of the processor class

Codebase.description: Location of the assembly containing the processor

T4AssemblyReference.description: Assemblies to be referenced by T4 templates

T4RequiredAssemblies.description: After running the Transform target, the assemblies that must be referenced to compile the preprocessed templates

GeneratedTemplateOutput.description: After running the Transform target, the output of all tranformed templates

PreprocessedTemplateOutput.description: After running the Transform target, the output of all preprocessed templates

metadata.#: Metadata that controls how a specific template is processed

OutputFilePath.description: Overrides the output folder for a T4 template. Note that Visual Studio does not respect this.

OutputFileName.description: Overrides the output filename for a T4 template. Note that Visual Studio does not respect this.

TransformOnBuild.description: Automatically transform T4 templates on build.

TransformOutOfDateOnly.description: Only transform out of date T4 templates

TransformFile.description: The T4 tiles to transform when running the Transform target

BeforeTransform.description: Targets to run before the T4 Transform target

AfterTransform.description: Targets to run after the T4 Transform target

IncludeFolders.description: Additional folders to search for T4 includes

PreprocessTemplateDefaultNamespace.description: Default namespace for preprocessed templates. Defaults to `$(RootNamespace)`.

UseLegacyTemplatePreprocessing.description: Place preprocessed templates beside the templates instead of dynamically injecting them into the build.

targets.TransformTemplates: Transform T4 templates. If `$(TransformFile)` is set, only the templates listed in it will be transformed.
